typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		dob as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> tempTable
tempTable split(isNull(toDate(dob, 'yyyy-mm-dd')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ErrorOutput, RestOfTheRows)
ConditionalSplit1@ErrorOutput derive(dob = toDate(dob, 'yyy-mm-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@RestOfTheRows derive(dob = toDate(dob, 'yyy-mm-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		EmpGender as string,
		DeptId as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> BadData
